players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Charlie: "I am innocent and need proof"
You: "Bob is the mafioso, and I acted alone. Trust my actions."
Charlie: "I am not the mafioso. Bob said he is, but I have no proof. Let's investigate him together."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found evidence that he is the mafioso. I suggest we investigate him further to confirm my findings."
